snippet: MERRITT--Zella Jonas, daughter of sculptor Louis Paul Jonas and a board member of The Olana Partnership, passed away peacefully on June 14th. In lieu of flowers, please consider: www.olana.org/support. 1/3...
lead_paragraph: MERRITT--Zella Jonas, daughter of sculptor Louis Paul Jonas and a board member of The Olana Partnership, passed away peacefully on June 14th. In lieu of flowers, please consider: www.olana.org/support. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  MERRITT, ZELLA JONAS
